NAME_CHAR_LIMIT: {{author}} The name of your guild can only be **25** characters long
NO_SPECIAL_FONT: {{author}} The name of your guild cannot contain special characters
NO_PROFANE: {{author}} The name of your guild cannot contain profanity of any kind
NEED_ITEM: {{author}} You need a **{{itemName}}** to create a guild
ALREADY_IN_GUILD: {{author}} You already joined the guild. Leave your current guild to join a new one.
GC_INFO_1: You are creating a guild. This process will consume a **{{itemName}}**.
GC_INFO_2: Press the **{{itemName}}** button to create a guild.
GC_WARNING: ⚠️ Using inappropriate or offensive text in guild names can lead to deletion without notice, irrespective of your progress. If in doubt, ask Sofi Support Staff beforehand.
GUILD_READY: Your guild is ready. Confirm to finish the process
